file_content.text: Enemy systems have been reduced to chaos.
The target's systems now betray them.
Your attack has achieved exceptional results.
Our primary weapons suffer from disharmony.
Functionality of secondary weapons is compromised.
Auxiliary systems no longer share our path.
We must protect those systems that protect us.
All tactical functions are diminished.
Our engines require repair.
A stone is removed from our path.
Target destroyed.
Enemy down.
We are sustaining damage.
Our ship has been hit.
The enemy has struck us.
Yuun is glad to help.
Disorder is always near at hand.
The shared path leads to harmony.
Yuun will discourage the enemy.
Shield systems are collapsing.
Yuun fears for the shields.
The shields will not stand much longer.
The hull cries out with despair.
This ship's hull has almost suffered too much.
The hull is nearing failure.
Enemy missile approaching.
An enemy missile stalks us.
A hostile missile seeks our destruction.
Missile lock acquired.
Our missiles are locked on the enemy.
Missiles are locked and ready.
An enemy has locked onto us.
Enemy missiles are locked on.
The enemy has achieved missile lock.
Many fall, but the path remains clear.
Each challenge is surmounted in its time.
Our acts give guidance and hope to others.
This challenge must be overcome.
Balance is restored.
Each act brings consequences.
Our shroud of stealth has been pierced.
The wind soars and cannot be touched.
No path is without twists or turns.
Like a gentle rain, plummeting toward purpose.
That which lacks form cannot be caged.
Good fortune rewards the proper path.
One need not seek to find.
None fail who can see advantage where it lies.
